name: sfpowerscripts-installdatapackage-task
friendlyName: Install a data package to an org
description: Installs a SFDMU-based data package consisting of csvfiles and export.json to a target org
author: dxatscale@accenture.com

inputs.name: target_org
inputs.label: Alias or username of the target org
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alias or username of the target org where the code should be deployed

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: Name of the package to be installed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the package to be installed

inputs.name: aritfactDir
inputs.label: Path to the directory where artifacts are downloaded
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the artifact directory where the artifacts are downloaded, If not provided, the default values will be automatically used

inputs.name: subdirectory
inputs.label: Install only a specific folder in the package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Install only a specific folder in the package

inputs.name: skip_if_package_installed
inputs.label: Skip If the package is already installed in the org
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip installation of package, if its already installed in the org

inputs.name: skip_on_missing_artifact
inputs.label: Skip If no artifact is found
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not fail the task if attached artifact is missing,Use it to skip artifact installation by removing attached artifacts
